translations: n.[脊椎] 穿山甲；[鱼] 鲮鲤

phrs.translation: 穿山甲, 制造的炽天使级龟盾, 制造的传奇级护盾
印度穿山甲, 印度鲮鲤
精确的穿山甲, 穿山甲, 精准的穿山甲, 刻板的穿山甲
穿山甲, 中华穿山甲
穿山甲, 马来穿山甲, 马来亚穿山甲

sentences.sentence: The Guardian has twice exposed restaurants that illegally sell pangolin.
sentences.translation: 《卫报》曾两次曝光非法出售穿山甲的餐馆。

sentences.sentence: 55,000 reptile skins from India, 19,000 big-eye thresher shark fins in Ecuador and 23 metric tonnes of pangolin in Asia have all been seized.
sentences.translation: 来自印度的55000张爬行动物皮、厄瓜多尔的19000只大眼长尾鲨鳍和亚洲的23吨穿山甲都被查获。

sentences.sentence: Malayan pangolin is released from its cage after being confiscated by the Department of Wildlife and Natural Parks in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia, on Aug. 8, 2002.
sentences.translation: 2002年8月8日，马来西亚吉隆坡野生动物和自然公园管理局将一只没收而来的马来亚穿山甲从笼子里放了出来。
